scripts.deploy-dev: yarn graph deploy ix-swap/ixs --debug --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
scripts.deploy-stage: yarn graph deploy ix-swap/ixs-stage --debug --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token
scripts.deploy-prod: yarn graph deploy ix-swap/ixs --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token
